component.feedback: ***You must enter the exact and full command. Commands that include a name or password are case-sensitive.***
component.existingcommands: R2 has been configured for HSRP group 10, priority 110, IP address 172.16.10.3, and virtual IP address 172.16.10.1. Issue the command 'show running-config interface GigabitEthernet0/1' to view the standby configuration on R2.

command.deviceresponse:
<output omitted>
interface GigabitEthernet0/1
ip address 172.16.10.3 255.255.255.0
standby 10 ip 172.16.10.1
standby 10 priority 110
<output omitted>
command.instruction:
Using the output from R2 as an example configure R1 as the HSRP active router using a priority of 150 and virtual IP address 172.16.10.1.
Currently configured on R1:
R1(config)#interface GigabitEthernet0/1
R1(config)#ip address 172.16.10.2 255.255.255.0
R1(config)#no shutdown

command.deviceresponse:
%HSRP-6-STATECHANGE: GigabitEthernet0/0 Grp 10 state Speak -> Standby

%HSRP-6-STATECHANGE: GigabitEthernet0/0 Grp 10 state Standby -> Active
command.instruction: <font size = '10' face="Arial"><b>Return to privileged EXEC mode and display the brief standby status.</font>

command.deviceresponse:
P indicates configured to preempt. |
Interface Grp Pri P State Active Standby Virtual IP
Gi0/1 10 150 Active local 172.16.10.3 172.16.10.1
command.instruction:
The company has decided to implement GLBP in place of HSRP. All HSRP configurations have been removed.
R2 has been configured for GLBP group 10, priority 110, IP address 172.16.10.3, and virtual IP address 172.16.10.1. Issue the command 'show running-config interface GigabitEthernet0/1' to view the GLBP configuration on R2.

command.deviceresponse:
<output omitted>
interface GigabitEthernet0/1
ip address 172.16.10.3 255.255.255.0
glbp 10 ip 172.16.10.1
glbp 10 priority 110
<output omitted>
command.instruction:
Using the output from R2 as an example configure GLBP on R1 with a priority of 150 and virtual IP address 172.16.10.1.
Currently configured on R1:
R1(config)#interface GigabitEthernet0/1
R1(config)#ip address 172.16.10.2 255.255.255.0
R1(config)#no shutdown

command.deviceresponse: <font size = '10' face="Courier New">*Jun 16 19:26:45.871: %GLBP-6-FWDSTATECHANGE: GigabitEthernet0/0 Grp 10 Fwd 1 state Listen -> Active</font>
command.instruction: <font size = '10' face="Arial"><b>Return to privileged EXEC and display the GLBP status without any parameters.</font>
